speaker: customer
text: Hi, I need to update my address. I've recently moved.
In the dynamic view, AI listens to the conversation and automatically surfaces relevant forms.
Customer is requesting an address change. This is a common request that requires identity verification and address update form.

speaker: agent
text: Hello Sarah! I'd be happy to help you update your address.

action: Retrieving customer profile and account information

text: Customer identity needs verification before proceeding with address change. Displaying identity verification tile.
AI automatically displays the identity verification form - no tab switching needed.

speaker: customer
text: Sure, I can verify my identity. My new address is 128 Oak Avenue, Springfield, IL 62704.
AI heard the address in the conversation and extracts the details automatically...
Identity verification in progress. Customer has provided new address details. Preparing address change form.
...and pre-fills the form! The agent just needs to review and confirm.

speaker: agent
text: I've pre-filled the address change form with the information you provided. Please review and confirm.

speaker: customer
text: That looks correct. I'll submit it now.

speaker: agent
text: Great! Your address has been updated successfully.
One task done! Now the customer has another request - watch how AI adapts...

speaker: customer
text: Thank you! While I have you, I also wanted to ask about a recent transaction.
Customer is inquiring about a transaction. This may lead to a dispute. Preparing to show transaction dispute tile if needed.

speaker: agent
text: Of course. Which transaction are you referring to?

speaker: customer
text: There's a charge from TechStore for $459.99. I don't recognize it.
Customer does not recognize a transaction. This is a potential fraud case. Displaying dispute transaction tile.
AI detects a dispute scenario and instantly surfaces the right form with pre-filled data.

speaker: agent
text: I see the transaction from November 24th. I've prepared a dispute form for you.

speaker: customer
text: Yes, I'd like to dispute it. I definitely didn't make that purchase.

speaker: agent
text: I've initiated the dispute. You should see a provisional credit within 3-5 business days.

speaker: customer
text: Perfect! One more thing - I'd like to update my phone number too.
Third request, third form - AI seamlessly adapts to each task without manual navigation.
Customer wants to update contact details. Displaying contact details update tile.

speaker: agent
text: I've pulled up your current contact information. What would you like to change?

speaker: customer
text: My new phone number is (555) 987-6543.

speaker: agent
text: Done! Your phone number has been updated.
Three tasks completed efficiently - AI handled the complexity, the agent focused on the customer.

speaker: customer
text: Thank you so much for all your help!

speaker: agent
text: You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

speaker: customer
text: No, that's everything. Have a great day!

speaker: agent
text: You too, Sarah. Take care!
